str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From kleros and the base of nomos (reflexively) getting by apportionment); a sharer by lot, i.e. Inheritor; by implication, a possessor.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From an obsolete particle ne- and epos; not speaking, i.e. An infant; figuratively, a simple-minded person, an immature Christian.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From dia and phero; to bear through, i.e. transport; usually to bear apart, i.e. to toss about; subjectively, to 'differ', or surpass.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
